title: With a 70% winrate on my main in 100ish games..
body: could I hit Platinum/Diamond if I played only them? My ex-bf taught me how to play Singed, Heimer, and I picked up Vel'Koz on my own. Currently I have 67% winrate in Gold 3 with Singed, 59% with Heimer, and 60ish with Vel'Koz, if I played only my mains would platinum and maybe even diamond be in reach?
